title: Pantheon ult bug
body: Hello guys.Whenever i use panth's r and I have the camera locked I can't lock it again, which is frustrating at big teamfights.It is fixed sometimes when I recall and when I respawn.Did anyone experience the same thing?

replies.body: Already reported this [nearly a month ago](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/ONaIIpXl-gameplay-minimap-targeting-during-pantheon-ult-breaks-the-camera-controls). The bug occurs when you target Panth's ult by clicking and dragging the minimap and release the minimap during the second ult cast bar. The keyboard hotkey to toggle the camera lock will work again after you click the UI button for it near the minimap.
All you have to do is press the space bar after you pressed Y to lock and it will be refocused on your character and locked. Happens to me too bud
Ok it worked. Thanks a lot!
